title: How to Make Paneer Stuffing for Rotis for Kids

steps.headline: Take the boiled milk in a kettle.
Add juice from lemon into it.
Curdling occurs in the milk as soon as lemon juice is added to the milk.
Mix the milk properly with the spoon to ensure that curdling occurs properly.
Solidification of milk occurs and water is separated.
Separate solid part from the whey(the water) with the help of a sieve.
Place the paneer in a small glass bowl.

text: Take the boiled milk in a kettle.  Add juice from lemon into it.  Curdling occurs in the milk as soon as lemon juice is added to the milk.  Mix the milk properly with the spoon to ensure that curdling occurs properly.  Solidification of milk occurs and water is separated.  Boil for some more time.  Separate solid part from the whey(the water) with the help of a sieve.  Place the paneer in a small glass bowl.  Add salt.  Add cumin seeds.  Mix them properly.  Use this to stuff rotis.
